faq.question: What budget do I need for Google Ads in Gort?
faq.answer: We recommend starting with €500-€1,000 per month in ad spend for local Gort campaigns, plus management fees of €750+. This budget allows for effective testing and optimization while reaching qualified customers in Gort and surrounding South Galway areas. Businesses can scale up as they see positive returns.

faq.question: How long before I see results from Google Ads?
faq.answer: Your ads can appear within hours of launch, generating immediate visibility. However, optimal performance typically develops over 4-8 weeks as we collect performance data and refine targeting. Most Gort businesses see positive ROI within 2-3 months as campaigns mature and optimize.

faq.question: Can you help businesses outside of Gort?
faq.answer: Absolutely! While we have strong local expertise in the Gort market, Kraft Agency serves businesses throughout County Galway and across Ireland. Our Google Ads capabilities extend to clients targeting local, regional, national, or international audiences.

faq.question: What industries do you work with in Gort?
faq.answer: We work with businesses across all industries in Gort – from retail shops and service businesses to agricultural suppliers, tourism operators, restaurants, and professional services. Our PPC strategies are customized to each industry's unique market dynamics and customer journey.

faq.question: What's included in your Google Ads management service?
faq.answer: Our comprehensive service includes strategy development, keyword research, ad copywriting, campaign setup, landing page optimization, conversion tracking, bid management, A/B testing, remarketing campaigns, monthly reporting, and regular strategy consultations. Everything needed for successful PPC.

faq.question: Do I need to sign a long-term contract?
faq.answer: No, we operate on flexible month-to-month agreements. While we recommend at least 3-6 months for campaigns to fully optimize and deliver best results, you're never locked into a long-term contract. We earn your continued business through consistent performance.

faq.question: How do you measure success for Google Ads campaigns?
faq.answer: We track comprehensive metrics including impressions, clicks, cost-per-click, conversions, cost-per-acquisition, conversion rate, and most importantly – return on ad spend (ROAS). You'll receive detailed monthly reports showing all metrics, plus 24/7 access to live performance dashboards.

faq.question: What if my current Google Ads aren't working?
faq.answer: We offer free PPC audits to diagnose issues with underperforming campaigns. Common problems include poor keyword selection, weak ad copy, unoptimized landing pages, or inadequate tracking. We can take over management and typically improve performance significantly within the first month.
